00025 b3TypedConstraint::b3TypedConstraint(b3TypedConstraintType type, int rbA,int rbB)
00026 :b3TypedObject(type),
00027 m_userConstraintType(-1),
00028 m_userConstraintPtr((void*)-1),
00029 m_breakingImpulseThreshold(B3_INFINITY),
00030 m_isEnabled(true),
00031 m_needsFeedback(false),
00032 m_overrideNumSolverIterations(-1),

00042 
00043 
00044 b3Scalar b3TypedConstraint::getMotorFactor(b3Scalar pos, b3Scalar lowLim, b3Scalar uppLim, b3Scalar vel, b3Scalar timeFact)
00045 {
00046         if(lowLim > uppLim)
00047         {
00048                 return b3Scalar(1.0f);
00049         }
00050         else if(lowLim == uppLim)
00051         {
00052                 return b3Scalar(0.0f);
00053         }
00054         b3Scalar lim_fact = b3Scalar(1.0f);
00055         b3Scalar delta_max = vel / timeFact;
00056         if(delta_max < b3Scalar(0.0f))
00057         {
00058                 if((pos >= lowLim) && (pos < (lowLim - delta_max)))
00059                 {
00060                         lim_fact = (lowLim - pos) / delta_max;
00061                 }
00062                 else if(pos  < lowLim)
00063                 {
00064                         lim_fact = b3Scalar(0.0f);
00065                 }
00066                 else
00067                 {
00068                         lim_fact = b3Scalar(1.0f);
00069                 }
00070         }
00071         else if(delta_max > b3Scalar(0.0f))
00072         {
00073                 if((pos <= uppLim) && (pos > (uppLim - delta_max)))
00074                 {
00075                         lim_fact = (uppLim - pos) / delta_max;
00076                 }
00077                 else if(pos  > uppLim)
00078                 {
00079                         lim_fact = b3Scalar(0.0f);
00080                 }
00081                 else
00082                 {
00083                         lim_fact = b3Scalar(1.0f);
00084                 }
00085         }
00086         else
00087         {
00088                         lim_fact = b3Scalar(0.0f);
00089         }
00090         return lim_fact;
00091 }

00094 
00095 void b3AngularLimit::set(b3Scalar low, b3Scalar high, b3Scalar _softness, b3Scalar _biasFactor, b3Scalar _relaxationFactor)
00096 {
00097         m_halfRange = (high - low) / 2.0f;
00098         m_center = b3NormalizeAngle(low + m_halfRange);
00099         m_softness =  _softness;
00100         m_biasFactor = _biasFactor;
00101         m_relaxationFactor = _relaxationFactor;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void b3AngularLimit::test(const b3Scalar angle)
00105 {
00106         m_correction = 0.0f;
00107         m_sign = 0.0f;
00108         m_solveLimit = false;
00109 
00110         if (m_halfRange >= 0.0f)
00111         {
00112                 b3Scalar deviation = b3NormalizeAngle(angle - m_center);
00113                 if (deviation < -m_halfRange)
00114                 {
00115                         m_solveLimit = true;
00116                         m_correction = - (deviation + m_halfRange);
00117                         m_sign = +1.0f;
00118                 }
00119                 else if (deviation > m_halfRange)
00120                 {
00121                         m_solveLimit = true;
00122                         m_correction = m_halfRange - deviation;
00123                         m_sign = -1.0f;
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 b3Scalar b3AngularLimit::getError() const
00130 {
00131         return m_correction * m_sign;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void b3AngularLimit::fit(b3Scalar& angle) const
00135 {
00136         if (m_halfRange > 0.0f)
00137         {
00138                 b3Scalar relativeAngle = b3NormalizeAngle(angle - m_center);
00139                 if (!b3Equal(relativeAngle, m_halfRange))
00140                 {
00141                         if (relativeAngle > 0.0f)
00142                         {
00143                                 angle = getHigh();
00144                         }
00145                         else
00146                         {
00147                                 angle = getLow();
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150         }
00151 }
00152 
00153 b3Scalar b3AngularLimit::getLow() const
00154 {
00155         return b3NormalizeAngle(m_center - m_halfRange);
00156 }
00157 
00158 b3Scalar b3AngularLimit::getHigh() const
00159 {
00160         return b3NormalizeAngle(m_center + m_halfRange);
00161 }
